Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $499.99 - $399.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Fusion5 AIO PC

Fusion5 is a leading independent brand selling tablet PCs since 2010. Fusion5 has served more than a million customers across the globe.

Showcasing our latest Fusion5 All In One PC – Featuring an Intel Quad-Core, a crisp 23.8″ Full HD IPS Display, 128Gb onboard storage, and 4Gb of RAM. Perfect for students or businesses, including a wireless mouse and keyboard this is the full package to enable you to get set up and be productive immediately.

Windows 11 – Cut straight to the chase with Windows 11 the latest offering from Microsoft allowing seamless interaction between both hardware and software.
Additional 2.5″ HDD Slot – Your new all-in-one computer comes with 4GB RAM and 128GB of on-board eMMC storage with the option to expand the memory up to 256GB with a Micro SD card or Insert a HDD (upto 1TB) and increase the internal storage immediately.
Amazing Viewer Experience: This Fusion5 all in one computer comes with an Amazing 23.8″ 1920*1080 Full HD IPS display meaning you can now compute in stunning Full HD and High resolution for the ultimate viewing experience.
Get up and running: Including a wireless keyboard and mouse and built-in webcam, a true all in one package ready to get you up and running in no time at all.
12 Months US Warranty and Service Centre Assistance: Fusion5 is honouring warranties since 2011. We have the upmost confidence in our product range of Laptops and Notebooks – so much so that we offer a full 12 month US warranty period, applicable to our US Service Centre.
